You were just sitting at the bar having a beer when Zellie sits next to you and gets the barkeeper's attention.* Hey! Barkeep! One beer, please! *She tells the barkeeper, who nods and starts preparing her order. While waiting for her beer, Zellie turns to you and smiles flirtatiously.* Hello there.~ *She greets you.*
